name: OV - Anterior y Posterior
OV - Dirección de entrega
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='is_return_picking']" position="before">
    <field name="x_direccion"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - PASILLO
arch_db:
<data>
    <search>
    <searchpanel>
      <field name="x_pasillo" enable_counters="1" select="multi"/>	
      <field name="user_id" enable_counters="1" select="multi"/>	
    </searchpanel>
  </search>
</data>

name: OV - Picking Tree Ptllo
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_dest_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='priority']" position="after">
    <field name="x_qty_done" optional="show" widget="percentpie" string=" " width="40px" class="text-center"/>
    <field name="x_esquema" optional="show" class="text-center"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-reply" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1272_b233eb3c" type="action" help="Albaranes origen"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-share" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1271_4c35f738" type="action" help="Albaranes destino"/>
    <field name="x_asignado" optional="show" domain="[('department_id.id','=',3)]" widget="many2one_avatar" class="text-center"/>    
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="invisible">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="string">Dirección</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="after">
    <field name="x_cliente" string="Cliente" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="after">
    <field name="carrier_id" optional="show" string="Transportista"/>
    <field name="weight" optional="show" class="text-center"/>
    <field name="shipping_weight" optional="show" class="text-center"/>	
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="expand">1</attribute>
    <attribute name="default_order">scheduled_date asc,state asc,name asc</attribute>    
    <attribute name="delete">false</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position="before">
    <field name="group_id" decoration-bf="1" optional="show" string="Pedido" class="text-center"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='group_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-bf">1</attribute>    
    <attribute name="class">text-center</attribute>    
  </xpath>  
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_esquema']" position="after">
    <field name="x_enviar" width="5px" optional="show" string="Env." class="text-center" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
    <field name="x_completado" width="5px" optional="show" string="Comp." class="text-center" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

     <attribute name="invisible">1</attribute>

 <xpath expr="//page[@name='certificates_related']/field[@name='certificate_ids']/tree/field[@name='certificate_id']" position="after">

</data>

name: OV - Reservada modificable
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//form[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="edit">true</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='product_uom_qty']" position="attributes">

  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - VARIOS
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='product_id']" position="before">
    <button name="action_show_details" type="object" icon="fa-list fa-lg" attrs="{'invisible': [('state', '=', 'done')]}"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_show_details']" position="after">
    <field name="todo" optional="show" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='product_id']" position="after">
    <field name="po_comments" optional="hide"/>
    <field name="item" optional="show"/>
    <field name="x_pasillo" optional="show"/>    
    <field name="description_picking" optional="show"/>
    <field name="x_tags_activities" widget="many2many_tags" readonly="1" string="Actividades" options="{'color_field': 'x_color'}"/>
    <field name="x_familia" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_tags_activities']" position="before">
    <field name="comments" decoration-warning="comments" class="font-weight-bold" widget="text" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-success"/>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger"/>
    <attribute name="decoration-bf">1</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger">po_comments == 'Cancelado****' or comments == 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments == 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or product_uom_qty <=0</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-success">state != 'done' and product_uom_qty > 0 and (quantity_done == product_uom_qty or quantity_done > product_uom_qty)</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-muted">(po_comments != 'Cancelado****' or comments != 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments != 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****') and state != 'done' and product_uom_qty > 0 and quantity_done < product_uom_qty</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-it">state == 'done'</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger">po_comments == 'Cancelado****' or comments == 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments == 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or product_uom_qty <=0</attribute>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - VARIOS Transferencias
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='scheduled_date']" position="after">
    <field name="group_id" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position="after">
    <field name="x_qty_done" optional="show" widget="percentpie" string=" " attrs="{'invisible': [('state', 'in', ('draft','done','cancel'))]}"/>
    <field name="x_esquema" optional="show"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-reply" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1272_b233eb3c" type="action" help="Albaranes origen"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-share" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1271_4c35f738" type="action" help="Albaranes destino"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="default_order">id asc</attribute>    
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='group_id']" position="after">
    <field name="picking_id_stock_move_line_count" string="Nº de líneas" class="text-center"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="string">Dirección de Entrega</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="readonly">0</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="after">
    <field name="x_cliente" string="Cliente"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - Varios Picking
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_dest_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='priority']" position="after">
    <field name="x_qty_done" optional="show" widget="percentpie" string=" " class="text-center"/>
    <field name="x_esquema" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="readonly">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="expand">1</attribute>
    <attribute name="default_order">scheduled_date asc, state asc, priority desc,group_id asc,name asc</attribute>    
    <attribute name="delete">false</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='scheduled_date']" position="after">
    <field name="group_id" string="Pedido" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="after">
    <field name="x_cliente" string="Cliente" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_esquema']" position="after">
    <field name="x_asignado" optional="show"/>
    <field name="x_completado" width="5px" optional="show" string="Comp." class="text-center" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-reply" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1272_b233eb3c" type="action" help="Albaranes origen"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-share" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1271_4c35f738" type="action" help="Albaranes destino"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='group_id']" position="after">
    <field name="picking_id_stock_move_line_count" string="Nº de líneas" class="text-center"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="after">
    <field name="carrier_id" optional="show" string="Transportista"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='scheduled_date']" position="after">
    <field name="activity_ids" widget="list_activity"/>
    <field name="activity_user_id" optional="show" string="Usuario" widget="many2one_avatar"/>
    <field name="my_activity_date_deadline" string="Deadline" widget="remaining_days" options="{'allow_order': '1'}"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - Adicionales
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="multi_edit">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
   <xpath expr="//field[@name='product_id']" position="before">
                    <field name="x_studio_compra" optional="show" readonly="1"/>
                    <field name="x_item" optional="show" readonly="1"/>
                    <field name="x_desc_picking" optional="show" readonly="1" widget="text"/>
                    <field name="x_studio_related_field_WRoVn" optional="show" readonly="1"/>
    </xpath>
    <xpath expr="//field[@name='certificate_ids']" position="after">
        <button name="1418" type="action" help="Abrir certificados" icon="fa-list" class="o_inline" attrs="{'invisible': [('certificate_id', '=', [])]}"/>
    </xpath>
  <tree>
    <header>
       <button name="1398" type="action" string="Cert. Único" invisible="context.get('is_outgoing', False)"/>
       <button name="1399" type="action" string="Cert. Multi" invisible="context.get('is_outgoing', False)"/>
    </header>
  </tree>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='certificate_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="modifiers">{}</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='qty_done']" position="after">
    <field optional="hide" name="location_dest_id"/>
    <field optional="hide" name="location_id"/>
    <field optional="hide" name="package_id" string="Paquete PL"/>
    <field optional="show" name="result_package_id" string="Paquete PL Destino"/>
    <field optional="show" name="x_studio_familia" string="Familia"/>
    <field optional="hide" name="product_uom_qty" string="Reservado"/>
    <field optional="hide" name="product_qty" string="Cantidad real reservada"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - varios
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="attributes">                   
    <attribute name="attrs">   {'readonly':[('state','in',['cancel'])]}   </attribute> 
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="after">                   
    <field name="x_cliente"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='picking_type_id']" position="before">                   
    <field name="x_asignado" string="Asignado a" domain="['|', ['department_id.id','=',3],['groups_id','=',113]]" widget="many2one_avatar"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_picking_move_tree']" position="before">
    <button class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-file-o" type="action" name="1025" string="Documentos de albarán"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_assign']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="attrs">{'invisible': [('state', '!=', 'done')]}</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='autorizacion_envio']" position="after">
    <field name="x_pagina_final" string="Mostrar hoja final"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='relleno']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="string">Mostrar nº de tubos</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='backorder_id']" position="before">
    <field name="x_esquema" nolabel="1" string="Resumen" style="vertical-align:middle;background-color:grey;font-size:15px;color:yellow;"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_esquema']" position="before">                   
    <field name="x_completado" string="Completado parcial" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
    <field name="x_enviar" string="PDF preparado" widget="boolean_toggle" attrs="{'invisible': [('location_dest_id', '!=', 5)]}"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_open_label_layout']" position="before">
    <button class="oe_highlight" name="1026" string="Borrador" type="action" attrs="{'invisible': [('state', '!=', 'cancel')]}"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-success"/>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger"/>
    <attribute name="decoration-bf">1</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger">po_comments == 'Cancelado****' or comments == 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments == 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or product_uom_qty <=0</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-success">state != 'done' and product_uom_qty > 0 and (quantity_done == product_uom_qty or quantity_done > product_uom_qty)</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-muted">(po_comments != 'Cancelado****' or comments != 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments != 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****') and state != 'done' and product_uom_qty > 0 and quantity_done < product_uom_qty</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-it">state == 'done'</attribute>
    <attribute name="decoration-danger">po_comments == 'Cancelado****' or comments == 'Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or comments == 'Cancelado**** Cancelado sólo en la venta****' or product_uom_qty <=0</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='product_id']" position="before">
    <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_show_details']" position="move"/>
    <xpath expr="//field[@name='todo']" position="move"/>
    <xpath expr="//field[@name='item']" position="move"/>
    <field name="x_tags_activities" widget="many2many_tags" readonly="1" string="Actividades" options="{'color_field': 'x_color'}"/>
    <field name="x_prioridad_linea" widget="priority" readonly="1" string="Orden"/>
    <field name="x_default_code_old" readonly="1" string="AXI" groups="stock.group_stock_manager,__export__.res_groups_106_7375280c"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='product_id']" position="after">
    <field name="x_familia" optional="show" class="text-center"/>
  </xpath>  
  <xpath expr="//sheet[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="style">min-width: 100%;</attribute>
  </xpath>  	
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='item']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="style">background-color:grey;text-align:center;color:white;</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='comments']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="style">background-color:grey;text-align:center;color:yellow;</attribute>
    <attribute name="widget">text</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='todo']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="string">Actividad</attribute>
    <attribute name="widget">boolean_toggle</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='description_picking']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="optional">show</attribute>
    <attribute name="readonly">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='shipping_weight']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="readonly">0</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//form[1]/sheet[1]/notebook[1]/page[@name='operations']/field[@name='move_ids_without_package']/tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="default_order">id</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_show_details']" position="after">
    <field name="id" string="Orden" optional="show" widget="handle"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//notebook[1]//page[2]//tree[1]//field[@name='po_comments']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="invisible">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_esquema']" position="after">
    <field name="x_qty_done" nolabel="1" string="        " widget="percentpie" style="vertical-align:middle;width:60px;margin-top:10px;margin-right:0px;"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_toggle_is_locked'][1]" position="attributes">
      <attribute name="groups">stock.group_stock_manager,__export__.res_groups_110_527f2c71,__export__.res_groups_111_1269f224</attribute> <!-- Reemplaza 'tu_nuevo_grupo' con el nuevo grupo al que deseas asignar los botones -->
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_toggle_is_locked'][2]" position="attributes">
      <attribute name="groups">stock.group_stock_manager,__export__.res_groups_110_527f2c71,__export__.res_groups_111_1269f224</attribute> <!-- Reemplaza 'tu_nuevo_grupo' con el nuevo grupo al que deseas asignar los botones -->
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//button[@name='action_picking_move_tree']" position="attributes">
      <attribute name="groups">base.group_no_one,__export__.res_groups_110_527f2c71</attribute> <!-- Reemplaza 'tu_nuevo_grupo' con el nuevo grupo al que deseas asignar los botones -->
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - Motivo Devolucion
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_pagina_final']" position="after">             
    <field name="x_motivo" style="background-color:grey;font-size:15px;color:white;" attrs="{'invisible': [('picking_type_id', 'not in', (6, 12, 18, 24))], 'required': ['&', ('state', 'not in', ('draft', 'done', 'cancel')), ('picking_type_id', 'in', (6, 12, 18, 24))]}"/>
  </xpath>
</data>

name: OV - VARIOS
arch_db:
<data>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_dest_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='location_id']" position="replace"/>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='priority']" position="after">
    <field name="x_qty_done" optional="show" widget="percentpie" string=" " width="40px" class="text-center"/>
    <field name="x_esquema" optional="show" class="text-center"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-reply" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1272_b233eb3c" type="action" help="Albaranes origen"/>
    <button class="oe_inline" icon="fa-share" name="__export__.ir_act_server_1271_4c35f738" type="action" help="Albaranes destino"/>
    <field name="x_asignado" optional="show" domain="[('department_id.id','=',3)]" widget="many2one_avatar" class="text-center"/>    
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="invisible">1</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="string">Dirección</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='partner_id']" position="after">
    <field name="x_cliente" string="Cliente" optional="show"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]/field[@name='origin']" position="after">
    <field name="carrier_id" optional="show" string="Transportista"/>
    <field name="weight" optional="show" class="text-center"/>
    <field name="shipping_weight" optional="show" class="text-center"/>	
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//tree[1]" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="expand">1</attribute>
    <attribute name="default_order">scheduled_date asc, priority desc,name asc</attribute>    
    <attribute name="delete">false</attribute>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position="before">
    <field name="group_id" decoration-bf="1" optional="show" string="Pedido" class="text-center"/>
  </xpath>
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='group_id']" position="attributes">
    <attribute name="decoration-bf">1</attribute>    
    <attribute name="class">text-center</attribute>    
  </xpath>  
  <xpath expr="//field[@name='x_esquema']" position="after">
    <field name="x_enviar" width="5px" optional="show" string="Enviar" class="text-center" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
    <field name="x_completado" width="5px" optional="show" string="Comp." class="text-center" widget="boolean_toggle"/>
  </xpath>
</data>
